PERSONAL

The freedom of selfemployment comes with the
responsibility of managing
finances without a fixed
income. The secret? Smart
financial planning.
Start with a simple budget,
strengthen it with an
emergency fund, and track
your spending using financial
apps. Set clear goals so every
ringgit counts towards your
future.
For a more secure future,
voluntary contributions
through i-Saraan can help
you build strong EPF savings,
even if you start small.
Register i-Saraan
Now
